name: workflow_remove_cart_item
description: Remove a specified product from the shopping cart. PRECONDITION: The cart must contain the product to remove. Successful outcome: The product is removed from the cart.

steps.description: Open the Shopping Cart page at a fixed, valid URL to avoid invalid navigation inputs.
Cart content and element hashes are dynamic; the agent locates the row by visible product name and triggers its remove action.
steps.task: On the Shopping Cart page, find the cart line item whose product name most closely matches "{product_name}" and click its associated "Remove item" control/link.

steps.description: Wait for the cart update confirmation to ensure the product is successfully removed.

input_schema.name: base_url
input_schema.description: Base URL with protocol (e.g., http://localhost:7770 for VWA or http://3.12.136.212:7770 for WebArena)
